pr_title: Update response code to 204 for delete operation in UserStores Api

timeline.author: IsuraD

replies.bodyText: Also, Can we say that the deletion was a success if an exception occurred.
replies.author: IsuraD

replies.bodyText: Added a debug log. Here we are catching a client exception. Since this is a delete operation the only input given by the user is an identifier. So the only client exception that can occur here is the resource not being available.
replies.author: janakamarasena

timeline.message: Update response code to 204 for delete operation in UserStores Api
